fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Promotion and regulative frame of shallow geothermal technology for heating and cooling at European level; 
Training and certification of GSHP specialists.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Since 2006 - Member of European Geothermal Energy Council 
Since 2013 - Member of Romanian National Council for Energy World Congress (CNR-CME) 
Since 2015 - Founding member of GEOTRAINET AISBL - European training and certification association registered in Bruxelles
relevant_communication: Work package leader for Training, Education and Dissemination in 2 EU projects: Cheap-GSHPs (2015-2019) and GEO4CIVHIC (2018-2022). Responsible for 3 international workshops in the 2 mentioned projects.
goals__remit:
Main objectives: Promotion of heating and cooling systems with geothermal heat pumps (H&C GSHP); National and international lobby for H&C GSHP; Training and certification of personnel involved in H&C GSHP; Participation in national and international professional bodies; Participation in EU projects; Contribution in national strategies and policies.  
Member of EGEC, Geoexchange AISBL, CNR-CME. 
Main information: Partner in EU - IEE project GEOTRAINET (2008-2011); subcontractor in "Build-up-skills Romania - ROBUST" (2011-2013) and GeoDH project (2012 - 2015); partner in REGEOCITIES project (2012-2015); partner in Cheap-GSHPs project -Horizon 2020 (2015-2019); partner and WP leader in GEO4CIVHIC project - Horizon 2020 (2018-2022). . 
Winner of Energy Globe Award 2006 - National prize for the Project: “ROMANIA–a Clean Country in a Clean EUROPE–Geoexchange Technology” - Author Doina CUCUETEANU.
